https://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-core-ga/httpcore/apidocs/org/apache/http/entity/AbstractHttpEntity.html

org.apache.http.entity
Class AbstractHttpEntity

java.lang.Object
org.apache.http.entity.AbstractHttpEntity

All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpEntity

Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicHttpEntity, ByteArrayEntity, EntityTemplate, FileEntity, InputStreamEntity, SerializableEntity, StringEntity

@NotThreadSafe
public abstract class AbstractHttpEntity
extends Object

implements HttpEntity

Abstract base class for entities. 
Provides the commonly used attributes for streamed and self-contained implementations of HttpEntity.
